signatures.name: setProp
signatures.type: (propName: keyof Props, value: any, silent?: boolean) => void

signatures.name: setStyle
signatures.type: (propertyName: string, value: number | string | null) => void

contents: Releases focus from root. Also restores focus to the previously focused element.
documentation.contentsRaw:
Releases focus from `root`. Also restores focus to the previously focused
element.

contents: Traps focus in root. Also focuses on either initialFocusEl if set; otherwises sets initial focus to the first focusable child element.
documentation.contentsRaw:
Traps focus in `root`. Also focuses on either `initialFocusEl` if set;
otherwises sets initial focus to the first focusable child element.
